text: Sky Raiders (also known as Assault on the Forbidden Fortress) is a 1976 American action adventure movie directed by Douglas Hickox and starring James Coburn, Susannah York, Robert Culp, Charles Aznavour, Harry Andrews, Zouzou and John Beck. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1976 action movies Category:1976 adventure movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Douglas Hickox Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about terrorism Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Sky Riders
